name: 汉密尔顿·利芬
name_full: 汉密尔顿·利芬 Hamilton Luefan
introduction: Hamilton Luefan is an actor based out of Tampa Bay, Florida. Born in New Jersey and moved to Tampa Bay at a young age, Hamilton Luefan has always had a love for filmmaking. In addition to acting Hamilton Luefan is an athlete, adrenaline junkie, dog dad, and advertising professional. Hamilton is in the industry for the love of filmmaking and storytelling, and puts his heart in to every production he is a part of big or small.
